LaunchQueueSetConsumer.summary: The setConsumer() method of the interface is used to declare the callback that will handle custom launch navigation handling in a progressive web app (PWA). Such custom navigation is initiated via when a PWA has been launched with a launch_handler client_mode value of focus-existing, navigate-new, or navigate-existing.

remarks.para:
-Launch Handler API: Control how your app is launched
-
-Musicr 2.0 demo app
